metadata.Title: CVE-2021-33515 on Ubuntu 20.04 ESM (focal) - medium
metadata.Description:
The submission service in Dovecot before 2.3.15 allows STARTTLS commandinjection in lib-smtp. Sensitive information can be redirected to anattacker-controlled address.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2021-33515` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

dovecot-auth-lua - 1:2.3.7.2-1ubuntu3.4
dovecot-core - 1:2.3.7.2-1ubuntu3.4
dovecot-gssapi - 1:2.3.7.2-1ubuntu3.4
dovecot-imapd - 1:2.3.7.2-1ubuntu3.4
dovecot-ldap - 1:2.3.7.2-1ubuntu3.4
dovecot-lmtpd - 1:2.3.7.2-1ubuntu3.4
dovecot-lucene - 1:2.3.7.2-1ubuntu3.4
dovecot-managesieved - 1:2.3.7.2-1ubuntu3.4
dovecot-mysql - 1:2.3.7.2-1ubuntu3.4
dovecot-pgsql - 1:2.3.7.2-1ubuntu3.4
dovecot-pop3d - 1:2.3.7.2-1ubuntu3.4
dovecot-sieve - 1:2.3.7.2-1ubuntu3.4
dovecot-solr - 1:2.3.7.2-1ubuntu3.4
dovecot-sqlite - 1:2.3.7.2-1ubuntu3.4
dovecot-submissiond - 1:2.3.7.2-1ubuntu3.4
mail-stack-delivery - 1:2.3.7.2-1ubuntu3.4
No subscription required

criterions.comment: dovecot package in focal was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1:2.3.7.2-1ubuntu3.4').
